message.body: You're right, I can barely open my mouth. This is total horseshit
Haha its the worst. Are you at least able to drink your flackseed shakes?
Dude eating those shakes hurts sooo bad, idk why. Too cold maybe? Applesauce all day err day though
That's what I did. Applesauce and Greek yogurt. Sometimes that would hurt though cause the spoon was too big haha
Haha you and your chobani. So I wanna watch game of thrones but I'm scared to start it because it seems like a lot of work...
I love the books. I have only watched the first season, but I did that in like two sittings. It's pretty rad
Oh, i thought you'd watched it for some reason. Yeah everyone seems to love it. I don't even know how many seasons there are ughhh tv is so hard
There should end up being 7, cause that's how many books are planned but only 5 books are out. They're on the 3rd season for tv
Sooo much GoT. This is probably way too mainstream for me
Read the books, that's still pretty underground. Especially if you get past the 3rd book
Oooh you're right, do you have them?
Yes, but my first book is a first edition. I'm that cool
Omg. That's way to nice for me to borrow
You can probably buy them real cheap at bookmans. That's were I got that book
